item.title: The 8 Best Home Arcade Machines (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Rewind to the classic games of the ‘70s and ‘80s with a WIRED-tested home arcade machine.

item.title: Jeff Bezos is reportedly courting Trump after public spat with Musk
item.description: Bezos allegedly sees an opening for his space company, Blue Origin, now that Musk has been diminished in the eyes of the President.

item.title: 6 Best Phones With Headphone Jacks (2025): Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Headphone jacks are endangered, but they’re not gone. Here are our favorite smartphones that still let you plug and play.

item.title: People use AI for companionship much less than we’re led to think
item.description: A report by Anthropic reveals that people rarely seek companionship from AI, and turn to AI for emotional support or advice only 2.9% of the time.

item.title: YouTube adds an AI Overviews-like search results carousel
item.description: YouTube is rolling out new AI-powered features to help users find content and information more easily, the company announced on Thursday.
